ARABIC: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do you not see how He created seven heavens in layers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do you not see how God has fashioned seven skies one above the other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do you not see how Allah has created seven heavens, one upon the other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you not seen that God has created the seven heavens one above the other
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens atop each other?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: See you not how Allah has created the seven heavens in tiers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens, one above another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have you not regarded how God created seven heavens one upon another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: See ye not how Allah hath created seven heavens in harmony,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you not see how God has created the seven heavens one above another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Behold ye not in what wise Allah hath created seven heavens in storeys.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have you not seen how Allah has created the seven heavens in layers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: See ye not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: See you not how Allah has created the seven heavens one above another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you not seen how Allah created the seven heavens one above the other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do you not realize that God created seven heavens in layers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:15] Have you not seen how God created seven heavens in layers, one on top of the other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (See ye not) have you not been informed, disbelievers of Mecca, (how Allah hath created seven heavens in harmony) He created them one above the other like a dome whose different parts are cemented with each other,
